attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: lemme just tell you, this app literally RUINED MY LIFE!!!!!! when i was in a mental hospital, one of the other crazy people there kept muttering something he had heard 16 years ago over an unknown radio when fighting in the war. i could never make out what he was muttering, until the day i left, when he said it to me in private. he said “the trump 2020 app, the trump 2020 app, the trump 2020 app”. i was always confused about it, but thought of it as nothing. when i was at my house, i got an add for this app. i decided to download it just for fun on a whim because of my old friend from the psych ward. after i downloaded it... that’s when the curse started. first, my grandpa died on live television. then, my mom broke her ankle when i was showing her the new house i bought for her, which suddenly caught on fire. while watching my house burn, the cops showed up and wrongfully arrested me for a drug charge. people seemed to be getting hurt and dying all around me. so i went back to the hospital and asked my old friend why this was happening to me. he freaked out when i told him i got the app. he started yelling that it was unlucky and cursed. he told me for more answers to go ask the man he heard the original message with in australia. when i got to australia, i went to his house to find out he had killed himself due to guilt... the guilt of downloading the app and leading to tragedy for so many. he too believed it was cursed. on the flight back from australia, my plane crashed on a deserted island. i have been stuck on the island ever since, and it is terrifying. everything from polar bears to crazy baby stealing nutcases have plagued me. this app is the reason for my misfortune. -1/10 do NOT recommended.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review:
THIS APP HAS A VIRUS I WAS WALKING MY PET CATERPILLAR AND AS SOON AS I TOOK IT INTO THE GROCERY STORE SOMEONE STEPPED ON IT💔 THEN I WENT TO GRAB MY PHONE AND CALL 911 BUT I NOTICED THAT THE APP DOWNLOADED ITSELF AND CAUSED A VIRUS IN MY PHONE SO I HAD TO TAKE IT TO THE APPLE STORE TO GET IT FIXED! IT WAS A VERY TOUGH DAY FOR ALL OF US 
...
have🤔 you😒 ever😔 been😡 snaked🐍 by🙃 a🤨 friend👧 then😪 just😼 for🤦 the🗣 clout👀 they’ll😈 do😣 it😕 again🙄
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
